sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <v-container>
    <v-alert
    border="left"
    close-text
      dismissible
      dark
      color="green accent-4"
      v-if="show"
    >
      Thêm thành công!
    </v-alert>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title class="font">Thêm Thành Viên</v-card-title>
          <v-form
            ref="form"
            @submit.prevent="submitForm"
            class="pa-5"
            enctype="multipart/form-data"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="users.name"
              label="tên thành viên"
              :rules="rules"
            >
            </v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="users.gender"
              label="Giới tính"
              :rules="rules"
            >
            </v-text-field>
            <v-text-field v-model="users.email" label="Email" :rules="rules">
            </v-text-field>
            <v-text-field v-model="users.password" label="Mật khẩu">
            </v-text-field>

            <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">add</v-btn>
          </v-form>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";
import API from "@/services/api.user";
export default {
  name: "add-user",
  data() {
    return {
      rules: [(value) => !!value || "this field is required"],
      users: {
        name: "",
        gender: "",
        email: "",
        password: "",
      },
      show: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async submitForm() {
      const formUser = new FormData();
      formUser.append("name", this.users.name);
      formUser.append("gender", this.users.gender);
      formUser.append("email", this.users.email);
      formUser.append("password", this.users.password);
      for (const value of formUser.values()) {
        console.log(value);
      }

      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        const res = await API.addUser(formUser);
        if (res) {
          this.show = true;
          this.$refs.form.reset();
        }
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style lang=""></style>
